title: Low elo (Bronze-Low Gold) free coaching
body:
Platinum player looking to provide some chill coaching to bronze, silver or gold players. 

Either drop a comment or add me ingame

replies.body: Hye man, I'm interested in your coaching. Particularly if you're a mid player? There are some champs I'm tryn learn to no avail. eg.g Azir, Cass

Although i'm all for the coaching, will it really make a difference in that elo bracket? Honestly that bracket is purely about luck and whether or not you get retards on your team. If you're already carrying games and popping off then you don't really need coaching do you?

Best advice people can give others in that bracket is dont play solo, pretty simple.
lol, that's definitely not the case. Every elo can be climbed out of with every champ in e very role.

> [{quoted}](name=jimuskin,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=B0w9ZVZW,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-01-05T05:50:40.361+0000)
>
> lol, that's definitely not the case. Every elo can be climbed out of with every champ in e very role.

Honestly that bracket is purely about luck and whether or not you get retards on your team.

He is not claiming that you can't climb with every role and every champion, he is just stating that you are not the one in control of it occurring.
That's where you're wrong. If you keep that mindset you will stay in that elo bracket for the rest of your life
That may be true, but I still doubt a {{champion:16}} Jungle one-trick would do well

> [{quoted}](name=JesusForgotHisGA,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=B0w9ZVZW,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-03T07:18:38.647+0000)
>
> Although i'm all for the coaching, will it really make a difference in that elo bracket? Honestly that bracket is purely about luck and whether or not you get retards on your team. If you're already carrying games and popping off then you don't really need coaching do you?
> 
> Best advice people can give others in that bracket is dont play solo, pretty simple.

You have to have friends to do that. Just saying.

This seems interesting. My friend keeps pushing me to climb out of gold, but I had barely climbed out of bronze last season. It would be great to have a bit of advice and tips from a higher elo  player thank you!
How do you coach? Do you play a game with us, or watch our replays??
Pleasu teach me, senpai. I want to improve, been stuck in silver since season 4 :<

If you're serious, I'd love to get some coaching. Lvl 30 with 1 placement game. Keen for some chill games with a decent team mate instead of the flamers i usually get {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

EDIT: in game name is DobbyIsFree, I can add you tomorrow.
I'm looking for help. I am new to the game, unranked, lvl 6, and play adc bot only. I would like to get gud ;) Name in game is the same as on here.

can you please coach me! i'm silver 1 almost g5 and  i only play azir.
add me - oterladyfl
Really keen on some coaching and good on you for helping others out
